title: Its good but...
text: Good game ...most of the time! I make a shot & for whatever reason  I have to either Make the shot again or it says I ran outta time for no reason at all. Granite sometimes it will pause the game saying that The connection is slow even though I‚Äôm sitting in my living room with a solid Wi-Fi connection and then when it comes back to the game it says I ran out of time??? I‚Äôve lost a lot of games because of these issues & it‚Äôs getting old!!! I‚Äôll be looking for a different game if it does it one more time , in which , it inevitably will so ...  what the hell I just knocked the 8 ball in & game should have been over right?? 2 seconds later instead of the screen saying winner on my side.   The 8 ball reappears & ‚ÄúHasan‚Äù gets the ball & ends up ‚ÄúWINNING‚Äù   No integrity in this game that‚Äôs why I‚Äôll never spend a penny on this fake game run by BOTS!  What do u have to say to that DEVELOPERS?? R u gonna suggest that I contact tech support or blah blah blah like u usually do?!?

title: In game UI
text: This game is amazing in every way except for one. I would like a to make a request and this is the only way I know how where someone might notice. I hate how the matches default at the highest possible bet. This is very annoying because on mobile a slight tap instead of a scroll can match you up with someone for an amount you did not want to bet. I have had times where I accidentally pressed just a little and ended up in a game for 1-5 million coins instead of a simple 50 match. This is also the same with the other playlists where you choose your bet. The default is the highest amount of coins you can bet. I really think making the default the lowest amount you can bet would be a million times better. Additionally, it makes more sense to just have it go from the lowest amount so I can scroll to the right and play for more if I want without worrying. Please Someone see this!!

title: Good but has annoying extra rules and one bad glitch
text: It‚Äôs a good game that I can spend a few minutes on here and there and spending money does not help too much. My only problems are that there is a dumb rule and an annoying glitch. There is for some reason a rule that if you do not hit one of your own balls with the cue ball it is automatically counted as a scratch even if you make a shot. This occasionally leaves me with situations where all I can do is try to do some insane shot to get my cue ball around my opponents ball and tap my own or else they can get an easy shot. My other problem is a glitch where I will sometimes lose matches for no reason. At one point I lost three matches in a row and lost in game money as well as trophies even though I had won all three matches. Other than this I would give it four stars because it is fun and not pay to win yet not a revolutionary game that is good enough to play over pc games and spend a ton of time on. Overall I would recommend it.

title: Fun and frustrating
text:
One of the more enjoyable games I  have played except for being matched with someone outside my skill set which of course means I haven't a chance at winning and I lose my money and can't play and this happens all the time especially at night. I realize I need to hone my skills but when I am rank inked in single or double digits keep getting pitted against those in triple digits I just have to stop playing altogether for a while which isn't letting me enjoy the game. Also the fact that the emojis are used in an irritable manner to goad  you and distract you from making your shot. Good players  have respect and don't need to stoop to such tactics. I do wish  these points could be considered and dealt with. Giving of emojis and chat packs to try and diminish another's capabilities is in bad form  from the developer and the use of them  is juvenile and just plain rude and annoying   
Other than that I really do enjoy playing on a daily basis. 
Oh and what's up with jumping all over the place with the giving of cue prices. Can we not  just strive for pieces of a cue then after being granted a cue go on to another ? I cannot get one I  want nor want the ones I get and cannot buy the good ones because I just can't afford it on a pension so I am at a disadvantage from the start.
O.k. Now writing this review has mad me  upset with the casualties of gaming and distracted me from the  pleasure. 
All in all I Really DO ENJOY THE GAME!!!
just saying!!!

title: 8 ball pool
text: I‚Äôm having a problem updating ! I just recently got a new phone, a major upgrade and my app keeps telling me to update it and it brings me to the point to do so, and it don‚Äôt say where it needs updating! Yet I can‚Äôt play certain people because of it! Why won‚Äôt it let me update if needed, it‚Äôs how my phone is set and I try and there is none to be found! Can you help? Also I‚Äôve made balls and lost my turn for no reason or made a ball and internet gets slow , it shows I never shot it and I end up loosing my turn cause of poor connection! And if the person who breaks makes 8 ball.. if ya keep the game going , let such person at least loose their turn! Strange rules that ain‚Äôt fair ! Love the game I just have issues w it! People wait to play til time runs out ! And bam straight in every time! Lots of issues but like the game if maybe some things would change it be a lot better ! Sorry for ranting ! It‚Äôs facts !

title: Only one unfair issue I‚Äôve noticed
text: The game is fun and it for the most part I enjoy it and get frustrated from losing but who doesn‚Äôt right?  I don‚Äôt normally but when you find yourself in a great run basically a skunk match to beat the opponent the physics of the game changes to give you a disadvantage and give the loosing opponent an opportunity to catch up. I really get frustrated when the que ball will continue to roll further then it was able to in previous shots to make you scratch and give the advantage to the loosing opponent. It‚Äôs extremely unfair for the game to do so and I‚Äôve played enough to know and be comfortable with a winning shot no reason for any kind of error yet the ball scratches. It‚Äôs pretty messed up they would do so when u add the slightest bit of power to a shot. The game needs to be more fair and quit doing its cheat physics to pressure the player to make in app purchases. It‚Äôs basically robbery, be cautious I would say on your winning shots bc it won‚Äôt allow you to do so.

title: 1 year+ player
text: I have been playing this game for over a year, and now when I open the fan to play it will immediately knock me off of getting to play. I have spent money on it, but I got mad the other day because there opponents can quit the game when you have won, but if you try any of the stuff they get by with, it's wrong. I quit 3 games and I haven't been able to play since. Now it wants me to put a credit card number in before I can play. Can't even get the app anymore. Has to be the most roboted game I have ever seen when it comes to playing their opponents. Especially if you rank decent yourself. Might as well start a new game with a different name. Game is a joke. The higher you rank the less you have a chance to win. It's a fun game but the game is set up to make you spend money. It's really a competitive game. It definitely has game owner glitches to it. And I just keep coming back to play it.

title: To many glitches
text: There are to many glitches on this game especially when you have big money on big games when it comes to the $100 games no problem but how convenient every time it's a big money game there's glitches in the time makes you run out you make a perfect shot and it's not enough power behind it just too many BS behind this game I think it's a scam to take all your money I've reached out for them to refund me on a game that I I played for 1000 points and all of a sudden it was 100,000 points that was deducted him there's no one that you could ever contact it's just BS it's a scam play for free and then just walk away I don't recommend it to anybody maybe now somebody will contact me  I won A game for over $500,000 and one penny was put into my account I do not get any prize money and said that he gave it to me and it did not too  many glitches for a game that I spent a lot of money on not right

title: It is OK
text: Ok, I am not going to fool around and beat around the bush. The match makings are terrible. I am level 13 and get into a match with a level 34. The spin to win is completely and underlying rigged. If I am lucky I will get a 500. But all the other times I get 250 coins. Every time I open a box I get the same thing. 50 coins with a modern cue. The scratches are rigged also. I am really confident that I am going to get 100k because I see two of them. Then out of nowhere I get 3 2ks. And I don‚Äôt no why we have to recharge a cue. Because in real life it doesn‚Äôt take 100 coins to recharge a cue. You don‚Äôt even recharge cues in real life. And don‚Äôt even get me started on how fast they run out. When it says cue has to recharge I felt I just charged it like 1 minute ago. The pass is OK. It gives you a really good cue but it is so hard to level up and finish the pass because of the poor match making. If I can‚Äôt win how am I going to upgrade and finish the pass? In conclusion I am not trying to make you not get the game. It is very fun but just some problems.

title: Playing against bots
text: I really thought I would like this game, but after playing at least 50 times I‚Äôm convinced you are playing against bots. Unfortunately, this means that in many (most?) games the winner is predetermined. If the game wants you to lose, you WILL lose. As others have mentioned, you line up a shot that should be straight into the hole and it misses. Not by a little - by a lot. I mean hitting the cushion outside the pocket and on the rail. Also, you might be beating an opponent that is struggling and all of a sudden they make 5 shots in a row to beat you. Even difficult ones. The last straw for me was that while I was playing well, building coins and increasing levels, I was playing opponents who were at very similar levels. Then I started playing in the more expensive rooms (higher bets) and suddenly I‚Äôm matched against players who are 30 to 40 levels above me. A couple of times they cleared the table and I didn‚Äôt get to shoot. I felt as though the game wanted me to lose a whole bunch of coins so that they could sell me more. Graphics are great but the game play needs a lot of work.

title: Yes sir
text: 5 stares for me because no matter how old you are you can have friendly battle in pool with a wide range of ages. actually I‚Äôve only played 5 rounds I got the hang of it fast and it was fun. I‚Äôm only 11 so sure because of my age don‚Äôt  believe me, but at least I know that this game is five stares other than the fact it took me what five min. To figure out how to use the game. My entire family other than my mom has the game I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs a great experience. The game is super fun and you don‚Äôt even have to leave the comfort of your home. Well, your priority know that because it‚Äôs not that you download instead of going to a bar or something. Of course that‚Äôs why I kid like me has the app because I can‚Äôt exactly go to a bar. Sorry, that sounded weird to pray didn‚Äôt make sense but I hope you take my love you to heart. Any way, for all you know, I could be riding this on the toilet.

title: Pretty much pay to win
text: This implements just about everything I despise about mobile games. It constantly tries to get you to spend money in about 100 different ways (ex: scratch off tickets, wheel spins, crates, elite status, vip, coins, cash, and many many more). To do just about anything in the game you have to spend in game currency (ex: new cues, upgrading cues, different avatars, messages emotes, etc). The crates that you get from winning sometimes take upwards of 8 hours to open and I wouldn‚Äôt be surprise if later on they take even longer. Every single game you have to pay credits that you‚Äôll lose even if you just want to play a casual game. God forbid you want to play a single player game to practice you STILL have to pay credits. Ironically it‚Äôs a pretty decent looking game up until you lose OR win and then it goes back to spamming you with different offers in an attempt to get you to spend money. I would significantly rather have them play short video ads than put all that junk in their game but to each is their own. You‚Äôre genuinely better off just going to an actual pool hall‚Ä¶

title: FIX NOW!
text:
Hey for those who are reading this. This app is awesome! But BEAWRE of all the pop ups and it‚Äôs funny because when you are in a game and there is a friend who comes online it ask if you want to challenge them. If you click the X to exit the notification it still ask them to play. It‚Äôs really annoying. I also really hate how much pop ups they have when you are on main screen. It will ask you if you‚Äôd like to challenge over and over and over it‚Äôs really annoying. So beware of this.

This game is fun not going to lie but they need to fix these issues. I know I can turn off notifications when my friend is online but I like knowing they are online when I‚Äôm playing. But it shouldn‚Äôt ask you a million times to challenge them. 

Let‚Äôs be real 8 pool. Don‚Äôt give options to exit a notification while in a game and still send a challenge to someone I didn‚Äôt want to play with at that time.

title: 8 ball reset
text:
I‚Äôve been playing this game for 3 or more years and as of yesterday I was playing 2 lower ranked gold star players with maybe 60,000 or less coins won & I potted the 8 ball and it reset the last play as of I never potted the ball. I potted the ball 3x before it let me win.  I go to my league chat to let them know the crazy shenanigans & notice my leader points went from 500,000+ to 2 points contributed to my league.  I dropped from #28 to bottom 2 of my league of 50 members.  I play one more game (a lower ranked player).....I
Believe I‚Äôm at 97 red star and it reset the 8 ball again, so I screenshot the players profile, quit the game and emailed miniclip.  They gave me
A generic reply about logging in from different countries or breaking the guidelines by transferring coins between accounts  & having some 3rd party software installed so you win your games.  When I told them I‚Äôve done none of those things and to investigate my games with those players, they said no further information could be provided and wouldn‚Äôt tell me when the ban would be lifted.  My coins are fine but my winnings don‚Äôt go towards my league.  I don‚Äôt know what kind of nonsense this is!

title: Just One Request
text: This is a very great game and I‚Äôm addicted to it. I do have a request though. When I press the 1 on 1 option, I usually play games that don‚Äôt cost that much money because I‚Äôm playing so I can complete rewards. However, when I‚Äôm done playing, the menu directs me to the most expensive round I can play. I‚Äôve accidentally clicked on it by mistake because I wanted to try again on the same level, but I instead start a round that I can barely afford. I have 750k so losing 500k would be devastating. The thing that I‚Äôm mostly scared about is accidentally clicking it and losing all my money. My suggestion is to direct the player to the same pot on the menu after he played it. Just a small change but I‚Äôve played with friends and they‚Äôve accidentally got in expensive games because of this. Just a request to save our lives from bankruptcy =P

title: 9 ball needs fixing
text: I love 9 ball but i think it needs better rules. Its based on luck 100%. The thing that is so unfair about 9 ball is that it pairs you with someone that bid the same amount of coins. But I am level 19 and i get paired with people level 50+. Its unfair when people have these god sticks with time added to there stick. 9 ball is based on speed, so every shot you make chunks the timer. But people with time on their sticks get plenty of time to take there shots. Then after they take there shots there time gets almost reset entirely. Its not fair to use sticks that add time to a game that is time sensitive. Another thing that makes the games so unpleasant is that there needs to be a call 9 ball shot. Sick of games where people are just slapping balls around and just so happen they get lucky and sink the 9 ball by mistake. Its a good game mode but completely unfair and not balanced what so ever. I love 9 ball way more than 8 ball at the moment. It just pisses me off when people win by mistake.

title: Real Honest review
text:
Lately I‚Äôve been playing non stop I can almost say. Problem is during 2023 Christmas event I was robbed of some cash from buying surprise boxes, I‚Äôd only be able to open 2 of the 3 that I buy with my cash which was upsetting. It‚Äôs like the second I opened would glitched out and not give me anything. I usually save my cash but I really wanted to complete the challenge.

I‚Äôm not really into strategy games, but the tables are a different. You are supposed to adapt to your surroundings. Your opponent effects the field as much as you do. This game taught me a lot where I want to hit real tables. These are real virtual scenarios just without the exact frictional physics. You can‚Äôt accurately calculate that with every mechanic in this game. This game will go really far. Developers a salute to you & the upmost respect. I have other ideas for this game I‚Äôd like to pitch.

That being said, I‚Äôd give it 4 stars for the motivation of improvement. To the future players save the coins, tournaments are your friends, add friends who defeats you (networking also helps build skills & free coins); don‚Äôt be so quick to build your sticks unless you want cue power rewards and saved for trophy tables. ‚ÄòCash is king‚Äô you need it but it‚Äôs useful if you spend it strategically.

If can dominate a pool game you can win in life! I like the. Thinking of my opponents and helps me learn how to adapt! Keep this game going.

title: Definitely needs improvements!!
text:
1. Please allow higher level players to discard any low tier boxes. It makes more sense to get rid of any low tier boxes to keep the player in the game if all he wants to do is get higher tier boxes. 
2. In tournaments you should be able to spectate the actual matches if you lose on your match rather than just see others count down the balls they have left or if they won their match. 
3. Please get better chat packs. Out if all the ones i own i only use 10 of them. They are horrible. Or just give players the option to chat in match or to mute them. 
4. You guys should introduce 10ball to this game like that players have several options of pool disciplines to play. 
5. There should be higher match rooms for those who don‚Äôt want to or can‚Äôt afford $416 subscription to play this game. ($8 a week)x 52 weeks in a year= $416 this price is absurd, just to play a game on your phone. If it was $5 a month you would probably get more people to buy it. Prices on this game are so ridiculously high.

title: So many bugs, where to start
text:
Since the last update, this game has had so many bugs, the fun of playing is gone. The aim is off, I can live with that and adjust my game, but when I break, the balls stop, just before shooting the table glintches and it‚Äôs a totally different table, balls are refigured. Also, the constant pop-ups of people who send you invites to play are false. I‚Äôve sat here playing with friends and we‚Äôve been in a tournament type of play, ‚ÄúJenifer invited you to play in London‚Äù, no she didn‚Äôt, she is sitting across from me and playing with Dan, it‚Äôs so annoying, and these pop-up invites are constantly and randomly happening. They actually interfere with the current game being played. If the player did not send out the invite, then why is the game generating fake invites that block the view of the game that is currently being played?

I‚Äôve been using this app to keep my pool league active during lock-down situation, we play on a regular basis, but the glitch with the balls changing as soon as the cue appears combined with the random, game generated invites is hard to play around.

title: ‚ÄúAll In‚Äù
text: Okay, so y‚Äôall, I‚Äôm really mad right now. Last night I wanted to play another game of pool because I love the game. At the very beginning after I pressed ‚Äò1 on 1‚Äô, I scrolled all the way to the beginning which was 1 passed the part where you pay 50 coins. That USED to say ‚ÄúPlace your bet‚Äù or something like that, but no, it changed to ‚ÄòAll In‚Äô where you bet ALL OF YOUR COINS for a chance to win all of the other person‚Äôs coins as well. I was on level 14 and had around 67,000 coins in my account. So, I played against someone on level 201 with about 100,000 coins. I immediately knew i wasn‚Äôt going to win 2 games in a row against this person. So I lost 67k JUST by pressing the wrong button/choice. And a suggestion for the game-makers: have a button that says ‚ÄúAre you sure‚Äù in the case of betting all you have. I got mad and deleted the app and only have 1 regret: read everything before you pressed the button!!

title: More than 100,000 coins gone.
text: It‚Äôs happened over a few weeks.  I have tapped on Spin, free shot & free coins.  I realize those are free, however when Advertisements appear it freezes up (not every time, but about 10% of the time), I‚Äôve had to reboot my iPhone & iPad to clear it. Before I rebooted it, I tried touching my screen & after a minute or two it went to the main screen, so I went to a selected game (usually Las Vegas).  While 2 or 3 shots into it, it goes (I know that‚Äôs what the other person sees, not me) and boots me off because the Advertisement screen comes on like I pressed it, well I didn‚Äôt, how does that happen while playing a game??  I know that person is ‚ÄúThe Winner‚Äù, when they didn‚Äôt win... the ‚ÄúGlitch‚Äù made them win.  I know I‚Äôm no million coin player, but I do purchase stuff.  I‚Äôm not buying anymore & I‚Äôm gonna tell who I can.  They don‚Äôt even have an Email I can locate them.  I realize Drops happen, but I‚Äôm tired of buying coins, to loose them illegibly.

title: Number 1 of all time game
text: The all around best game I have ever played and it is the only game that has been able to keep my attention and interest for a very long period of time!!! It never gets old and I play it as much as possible every single day and night!!! It has so many features that makes you think about it when not playing it as in having your own team and building everything up and winning awesome cues and they constantly have new ones that not only look stunning and cool  but just absolutely powerful!!! I love 8 ball pool and I have for years and I do not think I‚Äôll ever be able to stop loving this game it helps with day today issues also like stress and depression and anxiety and all that together with some education too top it off and give you determination to become the best and number 1 and having an amazing time doing it!!!!

title: Fun and addicting but....
text:
The only thing I don't like is you have to earn points to play.. I would rather pay $3 or $5 for a good game I can play online.. This way it does make it more interesting i guess but the stupid slot thing gives you a chance to win 50,000 or more pool coins and I have tried hundreds of times and never got more then 500.. It is set to give you less and that makes this kinda bs.. What would it hurt them to give you 30,000 pool coins? I am sure many people pay for money and keep them in the green.

UPDATE because they won't stop asking me to rate it even though I already did...
The wheel thing to win money or stuff is worse now.. I have seen the thing slowing to stop I a big number and the go past it REAL slow. I would rather not even have this unfair wheel thing.i did get 1000 on it one time but most the time I get 52 or 12.... Fun game though.
UPDATE AGAIN!!They keep asking me to update so here it the newest scam they are doing. When you watch a video to get 150 coins it gives the 150 a few times and lets you keep doing it but then only gives 15 coins even though it clearly says watch a video to get 150 coins. They have also added something that you can challenge your friends, friends. It will pop up looking like you have a challenge but it is telling you someone is on line and you can challenge them.
I still play the game and like it but all this extra crap makes it worse. I would GLADLY pay $5 to have no ads and no pop up crap!

title: Help Me Please!!
text:
I‚Äôve been playing 8 ball pool ever since I was little. I love this game so much. It‚Äôs definitely one of my favorites. I play it everyday. But just recently I decided to log off my current account so I can log into my old one. After doing that I realized that I couldn‚Äôt log back into my current account because it kept on logging me back into my old one. This has be happening to me for at least three days now. I thought that both my old and new account were both connected through Facebook but today I realized that my new account was never connected through Facebook. It was connected through Google Play. And I now see that you guys took that out. So I was wondering if you could possibly bring back Google Play. Please!! I really don‚Äôt want to start off from the beginning again, after all the work I put into it. So please, bring back Google Play. Thank you sooo much!!

-Vanessa G.

title: Broke player1
text:
I am finally deleting this app! It‚Äôs resets itself when your winning to purposely make sure you lose because it knows you will spend money. I have always enjoyed this game. I used to play it a lot and spent a lot of money doing it but I noticed the more money I spent, the more I would scratch no matter where I hit it and how I hit it. It was like there was nothing I could do about it and I went from winning all the time to losing all the time. So I deleted the app feeling cheated. After a couple years I started playing again. The exact same thing is happening! It‚Äôs bizarre. I watch the opponents ball hardly roll. I can barely hit the cue ball and it will roll right in to a pocket across the table repeatedly and I will lose. It doesn‚Äôt matter what stick I have earned or bought. As a matter of fact the better the stick the worse it gets. 

Also I noticed I am missing close up shots that are clearly aimed dead center into the pocket. Once the money and earnings are diminished the first thing that pops up is purchase more coins. This game is smarter than I thought. It‚Äôs fun and addicting but I imagine it‚Äôs cheaper to be a crack addict.

title: Miniclip review
text: I have played this game for years and I absolutely love this game.  I have noticed that if you do not join with your Facebook account this game will absolutely drain you of all your coins .  In that regard i feel cheated when you go from having 40 k coins to nothing in  about 3 days and you might win one out of 12 games you definitely feel as though you‚Äôve been robbed.  You don‚Äôt even get any bonus coins every four hours it‚Äôs really sad .  So I‚Äôm really disappointed with this game for that reasonNot to mention the fact that when you are playing as a guest for that long they trap you on one page and Ella way to get out of it is to come clear out of the game and go back in and clear history so that‚Äôs how I know they wanted me to login through Facebook and although I love this game with all my heart I really got to think if I‚Äôm gonna play it anymore . And when you play a game and the person each person breaks and runs all the balls and shoots in a ball and you don‚Äôt get a shot they should make you play again or something I don‚Äôt know it just seems unfair to me so I‚Äôll be debating this game thank you have a wonderful day.

title: Glitchy and starts games without hitting a button.
text: I have been playing for several months now, and generally was OK with the game. Lightly though it seems like a game will just start without me touching anything. I had the game open to collect some coins and received a phone call, exited out of the game, and when I laid my phone down, discovered that it had put me into the highest possible game that my coins would allow. Also, there‚Äôs been multiple times where it glitches and locks up on me then when it finally opens up, tells me my time is up, but yet I have had to wait two or three minutes when it says waiting for your opponent, then it gives him a complete turn. If this keeps up I plan to just delete the game and the account once they get a lot of players then the games get less fun because their servers can‚Äôt keep up.

title: Next update...make it so we can share our dollars with our friends.
text: My granddaughter and I play this game a lot, between us we have played 800 games. I always win a lot of dollars, to be exact, I have 2211 of those dollars. On the other hand, my granddaughter has 20 dollars, I guess you could say she is not very good. The daily dollars through the videos only give you 1 dollar. There is a new win streak about every 2 weeks. With that being said, my granddaughter, and other people on the game, can get 14 dollars every 2 weeks. Some people blow through that on the win streaks, which is good because the win streaks give you so many prizes. BUT, we need more money, WITHOUT spending real money. Is there a way you could make an update that could allow us to share our dollars with our friends, without having Facebook? Thanks for your time, have a great day!

title: Fix daily lucky shot timing & give a button for reporting cheaters
text:
People complaining about many bug and cheat issues which I agree with them but no one said about this matter. If you really want to give us a chance to win 5 cash by Lucky shot daily then fix a regular time. Fix a Regular server time. When I complete a lucky shot after that next 24 hours timing starts. Why man why?? You fix your Server time so that whenever we play lucky shot it doesn‚Äôt matter with daily 24 hours timing counting. I‚Äôm not good at English but I hope you get my point.
My another complain is - The game is fully loaded with Cheaters and Auto Computer üíª players. I know you set the Auto Computer mode to let us lose coins. It‚Äôs a good technique for your commercial business. Anyway, give us a button to report any Cheater so that you can investigate. Thanks

title: Addicting.  Fake Physics and Poor Shot Controls. Lots of Robot Players.
text: It‚Äôs a fun diversion for a few minutes.  If you‚Äôre a competitive pool player though, don‚Äôt expect real physics.  The ball can move at impossible speeds and you can shoot at impossible angles. Size of the table isn‚Äôt realistic leading to many more scratches than in real pool.  Unfortunately, the developers did a lousy job on the precision of the shot controls which you must use to aim.  They will sometimes fail you at the most crucial moments - all of a sudden the aiming slider mechanism stops working precisely causing you to miss otherwise easy shots.  Finally, if you advance to the highest levels (mostly at Paris and higher, 2.5M+),  mostly you‚Äôre playing robots with fake stats who are there to cheat you out of your coins.  Your perfect break technique will stop sinking any balls and the shot aiming mechanism will suddenly fail to aim more often.  Very often, the robots will ‚Äúwin‚Äù the game without you getting a single fair turn to shoot.  Does that sound like a fun experience?  Would be more fun to play other people instead of fake cheating robots.

title: Doesn‚Äôt deserve 1 star
text: I‚Äôve been playing this game for years and I‚Äôve always noticed cheating. Either hackers or bots. But lately it‚Äôs been so bad that I don‚Äôt even want to play. When I select a certain bid, it will randomly choose a lower one and if it‚Äôs a reasonable amount of coins, I lose every single time, but if it‚Äôs a low amount, that isn‚Äôt worth my time, I win. I‚Äôve been losing coins by the millions because of this and some of the shots I lose to are absolutely impossible to happen that often. There‚Äôs also been time‚Äôs I‚Äôll pot a ball and it reappears on the table and says I ran out of time. It constantly ‚Äúloses connection‚Äù especially if you‚Äôre about to win. I‚Äôve also seen many players that coins don‚Äôt match how many games they‚Äôve played, especially in the championship games. How does one get to the top but barely played any games? There are so many more things I could probably list but this review would be endless. I‚Äôm so over it and it seems they don‚Äôt care to fix it. I‚Äôll sadly be deleting this game. It‚Äôs just not worth my time and the cheating takes away the fun in it

title: Great game
text:
This is a fun realistic billiards game that allows you to play people all around the world. I like that part. My problem is this:

The mini games are USELESS !!!! They definitely do not come in handy when playing on high priced tables. The spins don't even get you CLOSE to 1,000,000 coins, not even 25,000 coins. All the spins give you is the lowest priced coins on the wheel. And it is really annoying. And the lucky shots are also stupid. I try to aim for the red or the gold, and I do sometimes hit the gold but it's useless. WHAT AM I GONNA DO WITH 5 CASH?!?! WHAT AM I GONNA DO WITH 500 COINS OR 1K COINS?!?!? Absolutely nothing. So if those mini games weren't so darn useless and annoying and give will actually give you high priced coins when you NEED THEM, especially when you lose high priced tables, you'll lose lots of coins. Nobody wants that. So if it wasn't for that, I would give this game 5 stars. But for now, you'll have to stick with 4 until you improve these mini game spins and lucky shots.

title: Good Game, With Some Issues
text:
This isn‚Äôt a terrible game, but it does have some issues. The most obvious problem had to be the Spin and Win. Out of the entire time I‚Äôve played this game, I can only remember one time I got something higher than $500.
The new ‚Äú Lucky Shot ‚Äú is an absolute joke. The game sets you up in the craziest ways ( ball blocking other ball, etc ). Another issue is the power control. I play this game on a phone, so the power slot is on the left of the screen. I am clumsy some times, but often  when I‚Äôm positioning my shot ( pulling cue downwards ), my thumb slides the power which shoots the shot. The cue ball more than not, won‚Äôt even strike another ball, which means I‚Äôm then awarded a penalty. I absolutely hate the cue recharge. It‚Äôs not even a realistic concept. I also do think that the packs are kind of overpriced, but it‚Äôs no big deal. The game does have good graphics and an easy to navigate menu. Clubs are a fun concept and the boxes are good rewards. This game has some problems, but it‚Äôs pointing in the right direction

title: Glitch causes me to lose millions in VC
text:
I‚Äôm very disappointed in Miniclip especially their 8 Ball Pool team. They‚Äôve got very poor customer service that took forever to respond to my inquiry and when they finally responded, it was with an automated message. I worked hard to earn millions in VC/ coins in 8 Ball Pool only for me to load into a million coin table with the match glitched and I could not see any of the solid or striped balls. My opponent was easily advantage and unfairly won. I was so frustrated and went back into the match wrongfully thinking that the game would correct itself and give me my coins back. Unfortunately, the same glitch occurred where I could not see any of the balls, but this time they app suddenly closes on me and when I got back on it suddenly took me to the screen that said my opponent was the ‚Äúwinner.‚Äù I contacted Miniclip about this and even sent them a screen recording of what happened. They only sent me automated messages saying to check my Wifi. 

PLEASE don‚Äôt waste your precious time or money on this game. I‚Äôve already deleted the app. Miniclip is very disappointing.

title: Clubs
text: Some clubs decide on the last day,hours before the week is up to throw you out after playing and having millions in winnings and it‚Äôs messed up.I also was hacked in a club I was in before the new one I joined and a team mate in that club hacked 600,000 from my already won winnings and I know for a fact because I was monitoring my winnings to see how much goes into my club winnings after I win a million and the percentages are all different at times and whoever hacked also took 400,000 from another team mate and 600,000 from another team mate all in the half an hour after I noticed mine was gone and wrote about it in the club conversations we have privately to communicate and send gifts and challenges so that was messed up to I left that club and I was in it for 6 weeks ‚Ä¶  Ok that‚Äôs my review but I enjoy the game playing 9 years now‚Ä¶.thank you and have a blessed and good day(s) also goodnightüôÇüôÉüôèüèºüëçüèºüëéüèº

title: Decent
text: My only complaint is the game‚Äôs inconsistency. It almost seems like the developers use an algorithm to throw the game off to make it harder to win (or more importantly to then, easier to lose chips). Obviously if you got hooked on the game you‚Äôll want to keep playing. If you lose all of your chips, you‚Äôll be more likely to buy chips to keep playing. Some developers use this algorithm tactic to make money, which is understandable, however quite frustrating for the user. I‚Äôve experienced this many times while playing. I‚Äôll win a bunch of games vs players ranked lower than me and even much MUCH higher than me. Then all of a sudden I‚Äôll lose 10 games in a row, depleting my funds (chips). The worst part is that in these loses, the cue seems to strike the balls differently than in previous games, spins don‚Äôt work, etc.... Something is just ‚Äòoff‚Äô with this game. If you can get past this frustration then it‚Äôs a fine game; just be prepared for a bit of inaccuracies and some frustration along the way.

title: Good game
text: The free spin is a total rip off guys. More often than not I only get the low coins and I've been playing this game for a long time. I play other games with spin wheels and I feel like I've landed on nicer items than I do here and I haven't been playing them nearly as long. Also, I think it's a rip off that I get dues that I have already maxed out. There should be some sort of incentive for maxing out cues like not getting any more of that kind. It would be different if we could request cues in the clubs and help other club members out with cues they may want, but until then getting extra pieces of cues that I don't need is obnoxious, especially when there's so many. Anyway, I enjoy this game and spend money on it every once in a while, I'd just like to see it get better than it already is. If someone actually does read this from the devil team thank you for your time I appreciate the work you all have already put into the game.

title: Get rid of the cheating app!!!!!!!!!
text: This is dumb, can the people profiting from this game realize that the cheating app is a problem. Oh the owner of one is the owner of both. That makes more sense, cause why haven‚Äôt you fixed the thing you created, fixed, maintained, and owned. If you want to give the players with less knowledge a learning tool, great, but don‚Äôt let them compete in anything that is for the best players. You could also have rooms for the players who need this advantage. Then these players can see who breaks and then that‚Äôs the winner???? How fun does that sound?????? Oh it‚Äôs only fun when these cheaters barely tap the balls on the break and think, I‚Äôm doing the opposing player a favor, cause soon as it‚Äôs my turn I‚Äôm running the app, not the table you cheater, the app! Whoever owns this app, your the problem with this world, and the cheaters using the app, you have seen a mirror before, you know what you have amounted to so far in your life. I‚Äôm glad you get to win here, cause everywhere else in your life is a joke! You wish there was an app that could help that monstrosity, you wish!

title: The game forces you to lose
text: This game is so clearly rigged from the spin and win, the ‚Äúlucky shot‚Äú, the power that it takes to shoot the ball, the people that you play etc. The entire premise of this game is for you to spend money to play more. There are bots that will just destroy you. There are also times where you were repeatedly play people that are 4 or 5 times better than you are. They make you spend more coins to ‚Äúenergize‚Äù your pool sticks, just another ploy to get you to spend money on this stupid game. Breaking the balls is also rigged because you can hit the break the same way 100 different times and you will get different results from nothing happening to an entire 4 balls being made. So if I‚Äôm using the same pool stick and the same break method (shoot to the side), how is it that my break isn‚Äôt doing the same thing every single time? Makes 0 sense. Therefore, clearly, this game is definitely rigged only for you to just throw cash at this game. They shove ads in your face for you to just keep buying new equipment in this game too. I guess make you better.

title: Crashed 4 times!
text:
I like this game and at times have played for hours. With a few purchases throughout the last year I had increased my rankings and winnings enough to start playing in higher stakes games. Four times during the last year when logging in I lost all my earned coins, cues, and cash I had earned for in-app advancement. Each time the game wipes out all the achievements and resets back to ‚Äúbeginner‚Äù status. I have tried asking for assistance to restore my status on the game, even providing a steen shot of my player ID and game status taken the day before the crash, but the response continues to be ‚Äúit‚Äôs something I did‚Äù. ‚ÄúTry this, try that‚Äù, basically‚Ä¶..‚Äùsorry, that‚Äôs just the way it is‚Äù AND ‚Äúno refund for purchases made‚Äù

So‚Ä¶.my advice to players‚Ä¶.accept that you‚Äôre going to lose all your progress at some point and be reset to beginner status. If you make any purchases you are eventually going to lose what you paid for. AND‚Ä¶.you are not going to get any satisfaction from their No-HELP-help desk. 

I will continue to play but I will make NO MORE PURCHASES!! Buyer beware!

title: Be aware of being ripped off
text:
This app is designed only to rip people‚Äôs dollars and mostly the high stake games pairs you with a player from India. I bet no Indians would spend such a huge amount of money in this type of games. It must be the bot. I have spent quite a bit of $$$ on this and my time thinking it was a real people competing with a real human ....BUT I am pretty sure now it is not. Just be careful before you spent on this game. Especially, when you are about to win the game it says ‚ÄúWaiting for your friend please do not leave the game‚Äù or Says slow connection even if you are playing from full network zone and finally says you ran out of time even after you clearly see your shots went through as targeted and forces you to miss your turn and the opponent wins ...Sad ... very sad ....I have stopped buying coins now....There is something definitely wrong...

title: Sound drop
text: I love this app to no end! ! Well, just one! I spend hours playing this game and as you would expect like anyone else using their phone for games receive phone calls and/or text messages. The issue, at least on my iPhone 11 Pro, is that whenever I get said phone calls or text messages, whether I answer or close them off, the sound drops out for the game during a game and thereafter until I close the app out and reopen it. Sometimes I just set the phone aside and end gameplay. What‚Äôs frustrating about it happening during a game is that I depend on those sounds. With no sound you can‚Äôt tell when time is running out on your shot. Not to mention that the sounds are just satisfying to hear and make gameplay more enjoyable. Please take a look at this issue and remedy. Ty for an otherwise great app!!

title: So baffled
text:
I like playing the game but recently lost $400,000 coins from holding my phone wrong, entered two high stake rooms accidentally bummer. I had already logged off and didn‚Äôt know I entered advanced rooms until I played again, luckily my pool buddy always hook me up. 
I‚Äôve got a major issue I‚Äôve been letting blow by for some time. Why should someone whose just started playing this game go up against leveled players? This was me also in the beginning, pairing  me against players in 90+ levels. Playing this game is how I‚Äôm learning to play pool, it‚Äôs not fair. Just as I was then slow as molasses is how these new players are now, they take the fun out the game and my patience. Pair these Sunday drivers against each other and/or those up to level 50 until they‚Äôre more comfortable, tired of forfeiting games to slow norris‚Äôs, please look into this.

title: Cheaters and benefits of 8Ball Pool
text: This a fantastic game which I‚Äôve been following since I was a kid at the Jose movie theater in San Jose CA. It‚Äôs great for your mind and helps you learn geometry. The only reason I did not rate 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è‚Äôs is due to the unresolved issue to manage to get rid of the hackers online dominating the game with game cheats. I‚Äôve personally experienced at least 20 game cheaters that I played against in Berlin 50,000,000 chips in this 8 ball pool game and they win with precision and high success. I‚Äôve beat these cheaters before but only when 8ball pool allows me to break first. If they break first then you‚Äôre done, You lose your 25,000,000 chips. Reporting this to 8ball pool is all we can do but there is a need for attention to 8ball pool game cheaters. Lol, I still play the game because it‚Äôs an awesome game to play, very fun and interactive. Helps with development of the mind in mathematics.

title: Rigged
text:
This game is ultimately used to get over boredom. The only way to achieve success in this game is to buy into it. Lucky Shot is awfully rigged, one time you can pull the cue to a certain point and it send the ball flying. Another time you can pull the cue back just as far and it barely move. The games are just as rigged. You‚Äôll shoot a perfectly in like shot, and somehow the ball will curve when the cue, ball, and pocket were linear. This game can be fun, but in order to do good past a certain point, you need to buy credits, bucks, lucky shots, scratchers, etc. It‚Äôs a waste of time. Deleted the app at Level 61. 

UPDATE:
Redownloaded it temporarily, and won a scratcher for like 100K. Bet it on 1 game, went for the 9 ball shot, and pull the cue ALL the way back, and it barely struck the ball, moving it hardly any at all. This game is extremely rigged and designed to take your money. You will NOT ACHIEVE success in this game if you don‚Äôt buy into the pool pass, the coins, bucks, extra scratchers, extra spins, etc etc. Huge waste of time.

title: Pretty close to perfect
text: I‚Äôve been playing for a couple of weeks, and already feel like this is something I may end up playing for years. The physics are solid (unless you count not being able to scratch the cue off the table as realistic).  The angles, and the banks, are fun to achieve.  My problems have been random crashes- but only during selections of items from the main screen, never during gameplay gratefully.  Also, there are some minor tweaks I believe would make it more fun- like auto selecting the same venue after winning a match to run on a ring or achievement, instead of having to scrollscrollscroll to get back to the same venue repeatedly.  But all in all, exactly the type of PvP challenge I was hoping for.  Even offline playing is great for being away from Wi-Fi.  Solid!  *****5 stars*****

title: Amazing physics, poor feedback
text: If you want a super entertaining game to spend weeks, months, even years building your skill level - do not look further. The relaxing sounds and ball movement is accurate and therapeutic. The skill cap for players who want to become the next Efren Reyes is right at your finger tips. However, for the past several months there has been a cheat that is ruining the game entirely for the players who have spent years building their skill level. Miniclip has refused to comment on whether they are going to patch this cheat. To put it into perspective, some tables that are meant for the top players are now unplayable, infiltrated by these hackers. At face value, this isn‚Äôt a huge problem because you can simply play lesser tables, but the problem is that for high ranking players, earnings equate to rewards that are being taken by the cheaters. While I‚Äôd love to rate this game 5/5, the lack of transparency for months on end by miniclip is beyond unacceptable.

title: This game is the king of pay to win
text: Ive been playing this for a over a year now. While the game can be fun if u don't pay u are never going to go to that next level u as a competitive player want to reach. There have been times where Ive won 8 games in a row and WITHOUT paying a dollar Ive been able to earn up to 1M coins however once u have reached that level for some reason you will start loosing games. Somehow your ball will land in a bad spot that will not allow u to hit any of your balls and this will happen towards the end of each match even though I hit the ball with certain force and spin to make sure it lands in the right spot u know like good pool players do. This will cause me to loose at some point 7 matches in a row and while I am not taking away credit from my opponent it‚Äôs obvious the game is doing this on purpose so u can lose games and be forced to spend real money which I‚Äôve never done just like other games like FIFA, Madden Do. Its a shame bc its a good game made pay to win

title: Scammed unfortunately
text:
This game is not about if you are good unfortunately. This game has been programmed to mess with us, sadly. I‚Äôm still investigating this but so far I have noticed that there is a algorithm. The game will know if you have been winning constantly and once you have hit a good amount of winning streak you WILL go on a losing streak no matter what. You can be curve ball perfectly and place ball perfectly but somehow it will put you in a difficult position and make you lose your opportunity to win and then make the other opponent win. It is a cycle you just have to wait until the program will finally get you back on that winning streak. 

If you look at other reviews they have similar issues where if you mess up once the opponent will sweep up the table and you will lose (most likely computer opponent, not real player) or the game will make you lose to the point you lost enough money and finally get you some big wins. 

As a programmer I am going to look More into this because this is absolutely not fair and a scam. Please do not play
